sentences.sContent: This change is considered to be due to denaturation of the enzyme.
sentences.sContent_eng: This change is considered to be due to denaturation of the enzyme.
sentences.sCn: 据认为这种变化是由于酶的变性作用造成的。

sentences.sContent: It is believed that it inhibits an enzyme that promotes cell proliferation in tumours.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is believed that it inhibits an enzyme that promotes cell proliferation in tumours.
sentences.sCn: 据信它能抑制一种能在肿瘤中促进细胞增殖的酶的生成。

sentences.sContent: The enzyme he used is one of a broad class of enzymes that operate similarly on molecules like amino acids and nucleic acids, among others.
sentences.sContent_eng: The enzyme he used is one of a broad class of enzymes that operate similarly on molecules like amino acids and nucleic acids, among others.
sentences.sCn: 他所使用的酶是广谱酶类的一种，它们的关系正如其中的氨基酸和核苷酸一样，对分子起着类似的作用。

phrases.pCn: 酶联免疫吸附测定，酶标法
蛋白酶；蛋白水解酶；解朊酶

trans.tranOther: a chemical substance that is produced in a plant or animal, and helps chemical changes to take place in the plant or animal
